S

SaveException - Exception in game
An exception thrown when saving the game proves unsuccesful.
SaveException() - Constructor for exception game.SaveException
Creates a new SaveException with the default message.
saveGame() - Method in class game.Board
A method used to sace the game to the file "save.txt"
serialVersionUID - Static variable in exception game.LoadException
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in exception game.SaveException
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class ui.Game
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class ui.GameLog
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class ui.InfoPanel
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class ui.UIBoard
 
serialVersionUID - Static variable in class ui.UISquare
 
setActivePiece(Piece) - Method in class ui.UIBoard
A method used to set the currently active Piece.
setPiece(Piece, int, int) - Method in class game.Board
Puts the given Piece-object into the square defined by the given coordinates if the Piece is associated with this Board.
Skeleton - Class in game
A class depicting the Skeleton piece
Skeleton(int, boolean, Board, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class game.Skeleton
Creates a new Skeleton-object accordingly to the given parameters.
Sorcerer - Class in game
A class depicting the Sorcerer piece
Sorcerer(int, boolean, Board, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class game.Sorcerer
Creates a new Sorcerer-object accordingly to the given parameters.
special - Variable in class ui.InfoPanel
The JButton used for toggling the display of squares valid for the active piece's special ability's targets.
SpecialAbility - Interface in game
An interface that contains the methods required for special abilities.
specialExhausted() - Method in class game.Queen
A method that can be used to 'exhaust' the Queen's special ability, i.e. change the value of specialUsed to true, without using the special ability itself.
specialPriorized() - Method in class ui.UIBoard
A method that tells whether to priorize special ability targets' visibility over other options or not
specialUsed - Variable in class game.Queen
The special abilities of the Queen'extending pieces are powerful one-shot abilities and as such need an attribute to mark if they have been used or not.
squares - Variable in class ui.UIBoard
A List of UISquare objects used to visualize the Board
